articles.title: Life-changing eye implant helps blind patients read again - BBC
articles.description: The results are astounding and a major advance, say surgeons involved in international research using the pioneering technology.
articles.content:
Fergus WalshMedical editor
Sheila Irvine, who is registered blind, punches the air with joy at being able to read again

articles.title: Exynos 2600 Wipes The Floor Against The Competition; Samsung’s Internal Testing Shows 6x Higher AI Performance Than A19 Pro, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 & More - Wccftech
articles.description: Samsung’s reported internal testing results of the Exynos 2600 shows that its GPU and NPU handily beats the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and A19 Pro
articles.content: Samsung is shaping up to return to the flagship chipset category with a bold statement, as it is working to introduce its first 2nm GAA SoC, the Exynos 2600, in a few months. Before the grand unveili… [+2755 chars]
